page.title: 15COOMBE ROYAL HOME
page.content: {COOMBE ROYAL}is a residential home for elderly and senior citizens. The people who live here are usually unable to cope on their own any more or simply don't like living alone. They come from all walks of life and all have stories to tell. The house and gardens are very lovely. There are arbours and Peacocks and lawns to enjoy.Some of the residents are sad not to have their own home and some are lonely.It is too far to walk into the town. It is maintained by the South Hams District Council. The house has a fascinating history that includes mystery and fire! There are 25 bedrooms and the house usually takes up to 28 residents. Elderly relatives sometimes go for short periods while the family go away.(eg..on Holiday)
